text: Kɨdek takaw aglɨl agɨlak, Pol ayɨp bɨ kalabus ogɨnap ayɨp kɨlop, bɨ Juliyus anop ñon, sip dɨl poŋɨd Lom gapman bɨnonɨm mɨdeb man Yitali amnɨmuŋ agɨlak. Bɨ Juliyus, ne bɨ chɨm kadɨŋ gep bɨawl olap. Bɨ chɨm kadɨŋ gep ne anɨb okok kɨlop agelɨgɨpal, Lom gapman bɨnonɨm bɨ chɨm kadɨŋ gep ne yɨbɨl agelɨgɨpal.
